subtasks: Understand the word structure combining agriculture and business
Define business according to the Oxford Economics Dictionary
Apply the definition to agriculture, creating the concept of agribusiness
Understand agribusiness as a commercial activity in crop and animal production
Recognize agribusiness as involving manufacturing and selling of food products
Understand agribusiness as a farm or company producing and selling agricultural products
Become familiar with the structure and types of commercial agribusinesses

tasks.task: ** The user provided a definition of agribusiness, breaking it down into its components and explaining each part. The process starts by understanding the word structure, then defining "business" and applying that definition to agriculture. This leads to a comprehensive understanding of agribusiness as a commercial sector involving both farming and food product distribution. MAINTASK: Defines the term agribusiness through etymology, key definitions, and application. Sub-tasks cover each component of the definition in detail. **Answer is concise and directly addresses the MAINTASK.**
